comments:

just nothing happens and does not stop in any thread when looking in the 
debugger):

*** Bug 15766 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I reproduced the problem by placing a jar on a launch config classpath that 
does not have attached source.

Followup to comment on Bug 15766.

I removed the config and created a new one and it worked ok.
*** Bug 15955 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
